title: The Connor and Sparky SHow
overview: The Connor and Sparky ShowÂ chronicles the daily lives of Connor, Sparky, Tabitha, and Cindy - a ragtag group of kids with mismatched personalities. They have adventures/misadventures and go through their everyday struggles around their hometown of Oaksdale. The episodes revolve around Connor and his friends as they interact with other Oaksdale residents and their families and live out their day-to-day adventures, often getting caught up in various predicaments.
